long_description: Set up your kid's bike with the Dimension 742 Training Wheels kit and smile as he or she takes to the road for the first time. 3 slots on the brace arm allow this wheel set to mount on most single speed bicycles with 16 - 26 in. wheels. Sturdy steel wheels and heavy-duty bolts and hardware ensure long-lasting performance. Brace arms are designed to fit rear frame tubes up to 0.75 in. in diameter. Designed for use on kid's bikes with an estimated rider weight limit up to 125 lbs.
short_description: Set up your kid's bike with the Dimension 742 Training Wheels kit and smile as he or she takes to the road for the first time.
